author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)
quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge (Code Geass)
quote: The only ones who should kill are those prepared to be killed.

author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)
quote: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!

author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist)
quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. For you cannot gain anything without sacrificing something else in return.

author: Spike Spiegel (Cowboy Bebop)
quote: I'm not going there to die. I'm going to find out if I'm really alive.

author: Gintoki Sakata (Gintama)
quote: If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then live beautifully until the end.

author: Eren Yeager (Attack on Titan)
quote: I don't have time to worry if it's right or wrong, you can't hope for a horror story with a happy ending.

author: Saitama (One Punch Man)
quote: Human beings are strong because we have the ability to change ourselves.

author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)
quote: A true warrior doesn't rest until the battle is done.

author: Kakashi Hatake (Naruto)
quote: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.

author: Roy Mustang (Fullmetal Alchemist)
quote: When I, who am called a 'weapon' or a 'monster', fight a real monster, I can fully realize I'm just a human.

author: Mikasa Ackerman (Attack on Titan)
quote: This world is cruel. It's also very beautiful.

author: Alphonse Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist)
quote: Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost.

author: Kenshin Himura (Rurouni Kenshin)
quote: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.

author: Gon Freecss (Hunter x Hunter)
quote: I don't care if this is the end. I'll use everything. I'll fight you with everything I have!

author: Izuku Midoriya (My Hero Academia)
quote: It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.

author: Killua Zoldyck (Hunter x Hunter)
quote: I'm so tired of killing... I just want to be a kid. Hanging out, doing stuff with Gon. That's it.

author: Yato (Noragami)
quote: A god of fortune? Don't make me laugh. What good is a god who can't even save one life?

author: Erza Scarlet (Fairy Tail)
quote: Hurt me with the truth. But never comfort me with a lie.

author: Natsuki Subaru (Re:Zero)
quote: If you can't do something, then don't. Focus on what you can do.

author: All Might (My Hero Academia)
quote: It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.

author: Shōyō Hinata (Haikyuu!!)
quote: Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.

author: Meruem (Hunter x Hunter)
quote: You believe I cannot pray with a single arm? A prayer comes from the heart.

author: Kamina (Gurren Lagann)
quote: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in me! Believe in the Kamina who believes in you!

author: Yuki Takeya (Gakkou Gurashi!)
quote: As long as you're alive, you have infinite possibilities.

author: Char Aznable (Mobile Suit Gundam)
quote: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.

author: Shinji Ikari (Neon Genesis Evangelion)
quote: I mustn't run away... I mustn't run away... I mustn't run away...!

author: Kaneki Ken (Tokyo Ghoul)
quote: Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel.

author: Ryuk (Death Note)
quote: Humans are so... interesting.

author: Guts (Berserk)
quote: You're going to be all right. You just stumbled over a stone in the road. It means nothing. Your goal lies far beyond this. Doesn't it? I'm sure you'll overcome this. You'll walk again... soon.

author: Shigeo Kageyama (Mob Psycho 100)
quote: The powers I have are meant to be used for other people, not for myself.

author: Satoru Fujinuma (Erased)
quote: I'm not going to quit. I don't want... to have any regrets.

author: Winry Rockbell (Fullmetal Alchemist)
quote: I want you to remember that you're not alone. Don't carry the burden by yourself.

author: Maka Albarn (Soul Eater)
quote: If you feel like you're about to give up, remember why you've held on for so long.

author: Vash the Stampede (Trigun)
quote: The ticket to the future is always open.

author: Mumen Rider (One Punch Man)
quote: It's not about winning or losing! It's about me taking you on right here, right now!

author: Korosensei (Assassination Classroom)
quote: Whether you're a spectator or a player, what's truly foolish is to not even try.

author: Natsu Dragneel (Fairy Tail)
quote: We don't have to know what tomorrow holds! That's why we can live for everything we're worth today!

author: Alucard (Hellsing)
quote: Giving up kills people. When people reject giving up... they finally win the right to transcend humanity.

author: Guts (Berserk)
quote: If you're always worried about crushing the ants beneath you, you won't be able to walk.

author: Guts (Berserk)
quote: You should feel the pain of others as your own, and never avert your eyes from it.

author: Guts (Berserk)
quote: You're always gambling with your life, no matter what you do.

author: Griffith (Berserk)
quote: A dream... It's something you do for yourself, not for others.

author: Casca (Berserk)
quote: Even if we painstakingly piece together something lost, it doesn't mean things will ever go back to how they were.

author: Spike Spiegel (Cowboy Bebop)
quote: Whatever happens, happens.

author: L Lawliet (Death Note)
quote: Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya (Oregairu)
quote: Hard work betrays none, but dreams betray many.

author: Rider (Fate/Zero)
quote: Destruction and creation are two sides of the same coin. By destroying the old, we pave the way for the new.

author: Simon (Gurren Lagann)
quote: Believe in the you who believes in yourself!
